languages.text:
Bladedancers are swift and deadly masters of the sword, specialising in delivering flurries of rapid strikes, able to sacrifice a part of their health to enhance their close combat capabilities. Bladedancers prefer to avoid enemy attacks, either by parrying, dodging, or quickly repositioning before enemy counterattacks. They even have the ability to parry ranged attacks.
Core focus: melee, swords, movement, dodge, parry.

traits.locale_text:
Blade Dancers are quick and deadly swordmasters, specializing in inflicting series of multiple strikes in melee combat and can spend their health to make their attacks even better. They prefer to avoid enemy attacks, either by parrying or dodging them, or by quickly moving away from the enemies to avoid getting hit back.
Core focus: melee, swords, movement, dodge, parry, can parry ranged attacks.

Bladedancers are swift and deadly sword masters, specialising in dealing multiple rapid strikes. They can even sacrifice a part of their health to enhance their close combat attacks. They prefer to avoid enemy attacks, either by parrying or dodging them, or by quickly moving away before an enemy could strike back.
Core focus: melee, swords, movement, dodge, parry, can parry ranged attacks.

Bladedancers are swift and deadly masters of the sword, specialising in delivering flurries of rapid strikes, able to sacrifice a part of their health to enhance their close combat capabilities. Bladedancers prefer to avoid enemy attacks, either by parrying, dodging, or quickly repositioning before enemy counterattacks. They even have the ability to parry ranged attacks.
Core focus: melee, swords, movement, dodge, parry.

Bladedancers are swift and deadly masters of the sword, specialising in delivering flurries of rapid strikes, able to sacrifice a part of their health to enhance their close combat capabilities. Bladedancers prefer to avoid enemy attacks, either by parrying, dodging, or quickly repositioning before enemy counterattacks. They even have the ability to parry ranged attacks.
Core focus: melee, swords, movement, dodge, parry.

languages.text:
Los hojas danzantes son maestros de la espada ágiles y mortíferos, especializados en desatar un torrente de ataques rápidos y capaces de sacrificar parte de su salud para reforzar sus habilidades a corta distancia. Los hojas danzantes prefieren evitar los ataques enemigos, ya sea desviándolos, esquivándolos o cambiando velozmente de posición antes de sufrir un contraataque. Pueden incluso desviar ataques a distancia.
Especialidades: cuerpo a cuerpo, espadas, movimiento, esquiva, desvío.

Core focus: melee, swords, movement, dodge, parry.

languages.text:
ブレードダンサーは素早くて恐ろしい剣のマスターで、素早い攻撃を得意とし、体力の一部を犠牲にして近接戦闘能力を高めることができる。ブレードダンサーは敵の攻撃を避けることを好み、パリィしたり、かわしたり、敵の反撃の前に素早く体勢を変えたりをする。また、範囲攻撃をパリィする能力もある。
特に集中すべき点：近接、刀、移動、回避、パリィ
languages.original_text:

Bladedancers prefer to avoid enemy attacks, either by parrying, dodging, or quickly repositioning before enemy counterattacks. They even have the ability to parry ranged attacks.
Core focus: melee, swords, movement, dodge, parry.

languages.text:
刀锋舞者是敏捷而致命的刀剑大师，擅长发动一系列快速攻击，还可以通过消耗生命值来强化近战能力。刀锋舞者擅长招架、闪避敌人的攻击，也擅长在敌人发动反击之前迅速调整位置，甚至可以招架远程攻击。
核心：近战攻击、长剑、移动、闪避、招架。

languages.text:
Le danselame est un maître épéiste rapide et meurtrier, adepte des combinaisons de coups fulgurants et capable de sacrifier une partie de sa santé pour améliorer ses capacités en combat rapproché. Il préfère éviter les attaques adverses, que ce soit en parant, en esquivant ou en se déplaçant rapidement avant que l'ennemi contre-attaque. Il est également capable de parer les attaques à distance.
Points forts : combat rapproché, épées, déplacement, esquive, parade.

languages.text:
Klingenmeister sind flinke und tödliche Meister des Schwertes, die auf eine schnelle Abfolge von Hieben spezialisiert sind und einen Teil ihrer Gesundheit opfern können, um ihre Fähigkeiten im Nahkampf zu verbessern. Klingentänzer bevorzugen es, feindliche Angriffe zu meiden, indem sie diese parieren, ausweichen oder vor Gegenangriffen wieder in Position gehen. Sie können sogar Fernkampfangriffe parieren.
Kernfokus: Nahkampf, Schwerter, Bewegung, Ausweichen, Parieren.

languages.text:
Танцоры смерти виртуозно владеют мечом и сокрушают противника, нанося серии стремительных ударов. Чтобы усилить собственную эффективность в ближнем бою, они могут даже пожертвовать частью своего запаса здоровья. Танцоры смерти стараются парировать удары противника или уклоняться от них или же быстро перемещаться, чтобы избежать контратаки. Танцоры смерти могут парировать даже дальнобойные атаки.
Ключевые особенности: ближний бой, владение мечом, подвижность, уклонение, парирование.
